## Speed Change Handler

Updates playback speed state and returns JavaScript to change the Web
Audio API playback rate.

## Auto-Navigate Toggle Handler

Updates auto-navigate state and returns JavaScript to update the
client-side flag.

## Replay Current Handler

Returns JavaScript to replay the current segmentâ€™s audio. No state
change needed.

## Router Initialization

Creates audio control routes and returns the router with route
functions.
